entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5.
